column4: i have an interesting problem.  sometimes noises that aren't suppose to go to the speaker do.  for instance, sometimes the fan noises come through the speaker.
?..lol, thats the most ridiculous thing i've ever heard

i know.  i thought the same thing.  but it's true.  i can't figure it out.  also, when this happens, the sound my hand makes when it makes contact with the laptop comes through there too.  like it's amplified somehow.
i had to take this laptop to work to get a coworker to believe me!  maybe i should see if record-my-desktop captures that.
